name: TacticalCMDR v1.0 WebGL
description:
Downloadable Version Full HD:  https://ariel-estipular.itch.io/tacticalcmdr

1 vs 1 with a friend is recommended to play the game. or join available public rooms.

TacticalCMDR is a multiplayer, turn-based strategy game played in an 8x8 tilemap.

Each player takes 1 step on every turn, with the goal of destroying the opponents' commander unit. or infiltrate the backlines and bring your very own commander unit to the opponents' edge tiles.

Deploying all your units on the field and position them strategically to outplay and destroy the enemy's defensive position.

Your highest-ranking unit is vulnerable to the selected special unit. so beware.

try it out for free.

Join me on discord for your recommendations and suggestions. your feedback will be highly appreciated. https://discord.gg/TKgU3PyH
